Description:
Job Summary:We are looking for an experienced Pan-Asian Chef to join our team.General Requirements:Develop and execute a new Pan-Asian menu
Train and oversee kitchen staff in Pan-Asian dishes
Ensure the quality and consistency of Pan-Asian dishesSkills
Skills: The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 3 years of experience in a Pan-Asian restaurant, with a strong focus on Thai, Vietnamese, and Malay cuisine. Japanese experience would be an advantage.

Excellent culinary skills and creativity
Strong communication skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Ability to Relocate to Georgia (Country) 
Good HACCP knowledge
Strong hygiene practices

Preferred.Nationality: Indonesia; Japan; Malaysia; Philippines; Taiwan; Thailand; Vietnam

Data.Company Industry: Catering, Food Service, & Restaurant; Food & Beverage Production; Hospitality & Accomodation
